Reporting Period for Section 306 and Old-Law Pension
Income for Section 306 Pension and Old-Law Pension is computed on a calendar-year basis.Â  Since there are no new claims for Section 306 or Old-Law Pension, the income at issue is always the amount of income
received from January 1 through December 31 of the current year, and
expected during the next calendar year.
